item.description:
Hi folks! Let's get some exercise in the sweet summer air while we walk and talk with a group of friends.

LOCATION: This Meetup will take place at West Woods Trails, which is a Guilford Land Trust preserve in Guilford, CT. The park has many entrances, but for this hike we will meet at the SAM HILL ROAD entrance.

WHEN AND WHERE: Meet at 9:55 at the Sam Hill Road entrance, and begin hiking at 10:05. We will hike for about two hours.

WEAR/BRING: Hiking or other sturdy shoes with treads; summer clothing, non-cotton recommended, rain gear just in case; bring water to drink there is no place to fill up along the way.

COST: Suggested donation of one dollar, towards the monthly fee that is charged by the Meetup Website. Please bring any contributions with you on the day of the hike.

TRAIL MAPS are available at Bishops Orchards and other locations as indicated on the park website, if you are interested.

DIRECTIONS: For this hike, we will meet at the Sam Hill Road entrance. From I-95 exit 57. Go east on Route 1 approximately one and a quarter mile. At the second stop light make a right hand turn onto River Street. When the road ends, turn right onto Route 146 (Water Street). Travel a little over a mile, and make a right hand turn onto Sam Hill Road just before the railroad bridge. The trail entrance with parking is immediately on your left.

PARKING NOTE: There is limited parking at this entrance. Please carpool with other members if possible.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be standing by the trail map. (Evan)

group.name: New Haven Walks in the Woods

item.name: New Haven Hikers' Westwoods Walk
